sentences.en: The Navy is to launch a new warship today.
sentences.cn: 海军今天有一艘新军舰要下水。

sentences.en: The submarine had had time to submerge before the warship could approach.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇没等军舰靠近就及时潜入水下了。

sentences.en: Among the English vessels was a warship by the name of Mary Rose.
sentences.cn: 英国舰艇中有一艘叫玛丽·罗斯的军舰。
